summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3471, for the improvement of West Dawson Street, from 51st Avenue Southwest to 47th Avenue Southwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43040, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
